title: @riot
body: havent used my account in months, go to login its been perma banned, anychance you guys could look at the ip addresses and see that there would be a conflicting one to my normal one, thanks. IGN shem

replies.body:
You're going to need to submit a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that. I recommend placing your ticket in the _"I have a question about a suspension or restriction on my account"_ category.

Good luck! :)
